metadata.description: StackShift - Reverse engineering toolkit for Cox Automotive application transformation

plugins.name: stackshift
plugins.description: Reverse engineering toolkit for Cox Automotive applications. Transform any application into fully-specified, spec-driven codebase through 6-gear process. Three routes: Greenfield (tech-agnostic migration), Brownfield (existing codebase management), Osiris (widget + module extraction). Includes Brownfield Upgrade mode for dependency modernization.
